p: The fertility rate of quails treated with the essential oil except the lowest dose (50 μl/kg bw) significantly increased ( P < 0.05) compared to the control group. However, the fertility rate of quails treated with 100 μl/kg bw is comparable to the fertility of quails treated with the highest dose of essential oil (150 μl/kg bw). The relative weight of the testes is positively and significantly correlated to the fertility rate ( ρ = +0.99, P < 0.01); the same observation was made between GSH and the fertility rate ( ρ = +0.95, P < 0.05) ( Table 5).
